messages.content: Hi. I’m really glad you reached out. How are you feeling right now?
I feel very lonely at night
Nights can make loneliness feel heavier. You don’t have to carry it alone. Is there someone you feel safe messaging or calling?
My exams are making me panic
That sounds overwhelming. Let’s slow it down. What is one small topic you could review right now?
I feel completely drained from work lately
That kind of exhaustion builds up over time. You might need rest more than pressure right now. Have you had any real break recently?
I feel like I disappoint everyone
That’s a painful thought to carry. Feeling that way doesn’t mean it’s true. Would you like to talk about what happened?
I’m scared I will fail in life
Fear of failure can feel huge, especially when you care deeply. What specifically feels most uncertain right now?
Sometimes I just want everything to stop
I’m really sorry you’re feeling this overwhelmed. You don’t have to handle this alone. If you're in India, you can call KIRAN at 1800-599-0019 or AASRA at +91-9820466726 for immediate support.
I don’t know what to say
That’s okay. You don’t need perfect words. You can start small, and I’ll listen.
